BitKit.getColor: 获取识色循迹传感器读取到的RGB颜色值
BitKit.onColor: 当识色循迹传感器检测到特定颜色时，执行操作
BitKit.onLinePosition: 当识色循迹传感器检测到线的位置时，执行操作
BitKit.setMotormoduleAction: 设置小车底盘以指定速度运动
BitKit.setMotormoduleAction|param|direct: the direction that want to set.
BitKit.setMotormoduleAction|param|speed: the speed that want to run.
BitKit.setMotormoduleSpeed: 设置小车底盘左右轮的速度
BitKit.setMotormoduleSpeed|param|left: the left speed you want to run.
BitKit.setMotormoduleSpeed|param|right: the right speed you want to run.
BitKit.stopMotormodule: 将小车底盘的速度设置为零
BitKit.wasColorTriggered: 获取识色循迹传感器检测黑线的状态
BitKit.wasLinePositionTriggered: 获取识色循迹传感器检测颜色状态
